channel.title: [SRL][RS2]Ratz!
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][size=24pt]-=Ratz!=-[/size][/B]
[size=14pt]-=by WT-Fakawi.=-[/size] -=Inventor of SRL=-
[size=14pt]-=Version 0.30.=- [/size]
[B] SRL 3.0 REQUIRED[/B] [B]GET YOUR COPY OF SRL[/B] [URL=http://"http://www.villu-reborn.com"]HERE[/URL]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [/CENTER] [CENTER]Ratz! PowerLevels [B]Combat[/B], [B]Magic[/B], [B]Prayer[/B], [B]Woodcutting[/B], [B]Firemaking [/B]and [B]Cooking[/B]. All in one script, flawless....
Keep private, try it out, .... its fun!!! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [/CENTER] [LIST] [*]1. Place your Combat 15+ Players West of Port Sarim at the Altar next to the Rats by the Graveyard. [*] 2. Equip your Players with plenty axes (3), a tinderbox, and 3 pieces of armour. [*]3. If you want to train magic too, make sure your chars are[B] Mage Level-3[/B] and equip them with plenty water/earth/body runes. [*]4. For Better Callibration ColorPick the RatzWaterColor in Line 91. [*]5. Some basic knowledge of SRL is required. [/LIST] [CENTER]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [/CENTER]
[CENTER] [IMG]http://dakotastorm.sslpowered.com/dakotastorm.com/Pictures/RatZ.jpg[/img]
[B]Stand Here to Start and Sample MiniMap WaterColor (line 91).[/B]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [/CENTER]
[CENTER][B]What does Ratz do?[/B][/CENTER]
This script Attacks Goblins and Rats, Picks up Coins, Bones, Junk and Meat. It will perform confuse Mage. It will cut Trees, Light Logs and Cook and eat the Meat. Ratz! is entirely build around[B] timed loops[/B]. (Each Main Loop takes Approx. 90 seconds) So RatZ will keep on going and going and going. Use this script to level your Combat whilst enjoying the bonus of raising woodcutting, firemaking and cooking.
[CENTER][B]How do I run it?[/B][/CENTER]
- Get SRL from [url=http://www.villu-reborn.com]www.villu-reborn.com[/url] and copy the SRL include files to your /includes folder.. - Fill in the number of Players in HowManyPlayers -=line 118=- - Fill in names/passes/nicks of your Players -=line 123=- - Open Runescape client and drag crosshair over runescapeclient. Walk to the ratzspot with all your players. - ColorPick the Watercolor and paste in line 91. - Done. Run the script!
[CENTER][b]GENERAL NOTICE:[/b][/CENTER]
- Do [B]not [/B]wear bonecolored clothes nor have white hair! - Do [B]not [/B]use this script if you suspect your Players to be flagged, since the mouse moves quite fast around the screen sometimes :) - You are free to use any of my code IN FREE (!) PROJECTS as long as you credit me properly. I hate to see my code in "pay" scripts, so dont do that :D
[CENTER]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [B] Features:[/B] ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [/CENTER]
[LIST] [*] NO OPTIONS! ...:D dont even think about it :D (1720 ines of pure coding) [*]Kills Goblins. [*]Kills Rats. [*] Evens out Attack/Strength/Defence. [*]Collects Coins. [*]Collects Bones and Meat (and some other junk too...) [*]Cuts Trees. [*]Lights Logs. [*]Cooks Meat. [*] Eats Meat. [*]Buries Bones (Runs away from Shades and Zombies....) [*]Drops Ashes, Talismans, Kebabs, Beers, Necklaces, Broken Axes, Axe Sticks, Arrows, Chiefs Hat and Goblin Mails. [*] Fast FindTalk reaction/ little lag. [/LIST]
[CENTER]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [B] Future Plans:[/B] ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [/CENTER] [LIST] [*]Add Bigger FrameWork for Callibration [*]Add Range [*]Add Fishing [/LIST]
Credits: The SRL Team!
[CENTER]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[B]A Progress:[/B] ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [/CENTER] Worked for 14 Hours, 21 Minutes and 1 Seconds Killed 1077 Rats and Goblins Chopped 351 Trees Casted 699 Spells Lit 346 Logs Cooked 296 Times ********************************************** Name : Number : 6 Worked for : 126 minutes. Active : True ********************************************** 0 : = F. AT 42. ST 41. DF 42. PR 31. HP 43. MG 37. CO 26. FM 35. WC 31. W : 76 min. L: 1 : = F. AT 45. ST 45. DF 44. PR 30. HP 44. MG 12. CO 26. FM 34. WC 33. W : 88 min. L: 2 : = F. AT 44. ST 48. DF 43. PR 26. HP 46. MG 26. CO 22. FM 31. WC 27. W : 48 min. L: 3 : = T. AT 45. ST 44. DF 44. PR 26. HP 44. MG 12. CO 25. FM 31. WC 27. W : 191 min. 4 : = F. AT 44. ST 45. DF 43. PR 24. HP 44. MG 9. CO 18. FM 32. WC 28. W : 11 min. L: 5 : = F. AT 43. ST 39. DF 41. PR 23. HP 41. MG 12. CO 15. FM 24. WC 20. W : 43 min. L: 6 : = T. AT 22. ST 22. DF 21. PR 19. HP 23. MG 3. CO 24. FM 34. WC 30. W : 126 min. L: 7 : = T. AT 42. ST 44. DF 41. PR 25. HP 43. MG 10. CO 14. FM 18. WC 14. W : 195 min. L: **********************************************
/~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\ | SRL Randoms Report | | [url=http://www.villu-reborn.com]www.villu-reborn.com[/url] | ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~| | Logged in : 15 | | Trade[s] Made : 19 | | Fight Random[s] : 4 | | Talking Random[s] : 12 | | Dwarfs[s] Solved : 1 | | Rick[s] Solved : 1 | | OldMen Solved : 4 | | Capn Hand[s] Solved : 2 | | Certer[s] Solved : 4 | | New Box[s] Solved : 12 | \~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[CENTER]Enjoy, and [B][COLOR=Red] POST PROGRESS![/COLOR][/B][/CENTER]
P.S. i will NOT answer any nobular questions on the functionality of this script. Do not, I repeat NOT PM me about any malfunctioning of this script. If it is not working, it is something YOU do wrong. But, dont worry, there are plenty of Devs and SRL-Members around who are more then willing of helping you out. I simply dont have the time anymore.
WT-Fakawi!

@WT-Fakawi wrote:

[CENTER][size=24pt]-=Ratz!=-[/size]

[size=14pt]-=by WT-Fakawi.=-[/size]
-=Inventor of SRL=-

[size=14pt]-=Version 0.30.=- [/size]

SRL 3.0 REQUIRED
GET YOUR COPY OF SRL HERE

[/CENTER]
[CENTER]Ratz! PowerLevels Combat, Magic, Prayer, Woodcutting, Firemaking and Cooking. All in one script, flawless…

Keep private, try it out, … its fun!!!

[/CENTER]
[LIST]
[]1. Place your Combat 15+ Players West of Port Sarim at the Altar next to the Rats by the Graveyard.
[] 2. Equip your Players with plenty axes (3), a tinderbox, and 3 pieces of armour.
[]3. If you want to train magic too, make sure your chars are Mage Level-3 and equip them with plenty water/earth/body runes.
[]4. For Better Callibration ColorPick the RatzWaterColor in Line 91.
[*]5. Some basic knowledge of SRL is required.
[/LIST]
[CENTER]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/CENTER]

[CENTER]

Stand Here to Start and Sample MiniMap WaterColor (line 91).

[/CENTER]

[CENTER]What does Ratz do?[/CENTER]

This script Attacks Goblins and Rats, Picks up Coins, Bones, Junk and Meat. It will perform confuse Mage. It will cut Trees, Light Logs and Cook and eat the Meat. Ratz! is entirely build around timed loops. (Each Main Loop takes Approx. 90 seconds) So RatZ will keep on going and going and going. Use this script to level your Combat whilst enjoying the bonus of raising woodcutting, firemaking and cooking.

[CENTER]How do I run it?[/CENTER]

  • Get SRL from www.villu-reborn.com and copy the SRL include files to your /includes folder…
  • Fill in the number of Players in HowManyPlayers -=line 118=-
  • Fill in names/passes/nicks of your Players -=line 123=-
  • Open Runescape client and drag crosshair over runescapeclient. Walk to the ratzspot with all your players.
  • ColorPick the Watercolor and paste in line 91.
  • Done. Run the script!

[CENTER]GENERAL NOTICE:[/CENTER]

  • Do not wear bonecolored clothes nor have white hair!
  • Do not use this script if you suspect your Players to be flagged, since the mouse moves quite fast around the screen sometimes
  • You are free to use any of my code IN FREE (!) PROJECTS as long as you credit me properly. I hate to see my code in “pay” scripts, so dont do that

[CENTER]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features:

[/CENTER]

[LIST]
[] NO OPTIONS! … dont even think about it (1720 ines of pure coding)
[]Kills Goblins.
[]Kills Rats.
[] Evens out Attack/Strength/Defence.
[]Collects Coins.
[]Collects Bones and Meat (and some other junk too…)
[]Cuts Trees.
[]Lights Logs.
[]Cooks Meat.
[] Eats Meat.
[]Buries Bones (Runs away from Shades and Zombies…)
[]Drops Ashes, Talismans, Kebabs, Beers, Necklaces, Broken Axes, Axe Sticks, Arrows, Chiefs Hat and Goblin Mails.
[*] Fast FindTalk reaction/ little lag.
[/LIST]

[CENTER]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Future Plans:

[/CENTER]
[LIST]
[]Add Bigger FrameWork for Callibration
[]Add Range
[*]Add Fishing
[/LIST]

Credits: The SRL Team!

[CENTER]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A Progress:

[/CENTER]
Worked for 14 Hours, 21 Minutes and 1 Seconds
Killed 1077 Rats and Goblins
Chopped 351 Trees
Casted 699 Spells
Lit 346 Logs
Cooked 296 Times
